company_name.description: The name of the company providing the product or service

customer_name.description: The name of the customer or client

product_name.description: The name of the product being discussed or ordered

pack_size.description: The numerical value of the packaging size (e.g., 25, 1)

pack_size_unit.description: The unit for the pack size (e.g., Lbs, Kgs)

lead_time.description: The expected lead time or delivery time frame for the product

shipping_option.description: The selected or available shipping option (e.g., air freight, ground, express)

quantity.description: The number of units being ordered

quantity_unit.description: The unit for the quantity (e.g., kg, lbs, ozs, etc.)

packing_type.description: The physical packaging type used for shipping (e.g., drum, bottle, bag)

alternate_company_names.description: A list of plausible alternative company names or abbreviations (e.g., ['COIM', 'COIM USA', 'COIM SpA'])

cas_numbers.description: The CAS Numbers of the product(s) as displayed in the email body

cas_number_exists.description: A True or False statement as to whether or not the CAS number was able to be extracted from the email body. True if it was extracted and False if not
